 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁי‎</span> **noun masculine** ==gift== offered as homage (√ dubious; perhaps in spite of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, verb ***wish***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thing*** (weakened from ***thing desired***); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵפֶץ‎</span> 

**4.**); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוּבַל שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.18.7|Isa 18:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֹבִילוּ שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.76.12|Ps 76:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֑י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺב‎</span> [[Ps.68.30|Ps 68:30]].
